description: A traditional Christmas favourite everyone loves and so easy to make. Don't forget White Christmas is a great gift idea - just package squares in clear cellophane wrap and tie with colourful ribbons.
keywords: Christmas slice,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Christmas,White Christmas,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: White Christmas Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine dry ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Melt copha slowly over low heat.
Cool slightly, pour onto dry ingredients and mix well.
Working quickly spoon into paper patty cases or press into a lamington tin.
Freeze until set (about 15 minutes), then store in the refrigerator.
